remark.p: Foreign Service Officer. Director of the Foreign Service Institute; Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary (Jordan); Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary (Bolivia).
Director, Office of Financial Development, Bureau of Economic Affairs, Department of State, May 1970-July 1971; thereafter economic-commercial officer at the Embassy in Bonn
Deputy Assistant Secretary of State for International Finance and Development, Bureau of Economic and Business Affairs, Department of State

Economic-Commercial Officer at the Embassy in Bonn, FRG, from 1973; the Policy Planning Staff from 1974; Office of Investment Affairs, International Finance and Development, Bureau of Economic and Business Affairs, as of 1975; Deputy Assistant Secretary for Economic and Business Affairs, from 1976

Economic-Commercial Officer, U.S. Embassy in Bonn from 1973; staff member, Policy Planning Staff, Department of State, from 1974 until 1975; Office of Investment Affairs, International Finance and Development, Bureau of Economic and Business Affairs, Department of State from 1975; Deputy Assistant Secretary of State for Economic and Business Affairs from 1976

Policy Planning Staff, Office of the Secretary of State until July 1974; thereafter Deputy Assistant Secretary of State for International Finance and Development, Bureau of Economic and Business Affairs

Deputy Assistant Secretary of State for International Finance and Development, Bureau of Economic and Business Affairs, until 1977; Ambassador to Bolivia from September 15, 1977, until February 17, 1980; Director of the Foreign Service Institute from March 9, 1980
